H0.text: Which European country has regions called Karlovy Vary, Plzeň and South Bohemia. Austria

H1.text: Which European country has regions called Karlovy Vary, Plzeň and South Bohemia. Germany

H2.text: Which European country has regions called Karlovy Vary, Plzeň and South Bohemia. Slovakia

H3.text: Which European country has regions called Karlovy Vary, Plzeň and South Bohemia. ČR

A4.text: The city of Karlovy Vary was used as a location for the 2006 James Bond film Casino Royale.

A5.text: Plzeň is listed as one of the major cities and urban areas of the Czech Republic.
